serviceData.title: Comprehensive Portable Toilet Rental Solutions in Los Angeles, CA
serviceData.p: Haute Porta Potty Rental supplies reliable sanitation solutions throughout Los Angeles County. Whether you're planning a wedding in Hollywood, running a film shoot in Burbank, hosting a festival in Downtown LA, or maintaining compliance on a construction site in the Valley, we have units and service plans to match every need.

lists.title: Standard Portable Toilet
lists.shortDescription: Cost-effective single-stall unit for construction sites, small events, and outdoor jobs.
lists.description:
• Designed For: Single-person use; quick, economical sanitation solution

  • Benefits:

    • Lightweight and easy to place on-site

    • Regular servicing and restocking available

    • Affordable short- and long-term rental options
lists.h2: What Is a Standard Portable Toilet in Los Angeles, CA
lists.p2: Our standard portable toilet is the go-to option for builders, landscapers, and small outdoor gatherings across Los Angeles. Each unit arrives clean, stocked with toilet paper and hand sanitizer, and is maintained on your requested schedule. Reliable pick-up and drop-off make it simple to keep your site sanitary and compliant. Call Us today to reserve units for your next project or event!
lists.tyesHeading: When Do You Need a Standard Portable Toilet in Los Angeles, CA?
lists.overViewContent:
• Not Included:

    • Running water or sinks (unless a handwash station is ordered)

    • Attendant service (available as an add-on)

What's Included:

  • Delivery and pickup

  • Toilet paper and hand sanitizer

  • Scheduled pump & clean options

Unit Dimensions (approx):
3' W x 3' D x 7' H
Usage: Designed for frequent single-user access; ideal for short- to mid-term needs

leftSection.title: ADA & Deluxe Units
leftSection.description: If you need accessible or higher-end options for events, check our ADA units and luxury restroom trailers for added space and amenities.

rightSection.title: How to Select the Right Unit
rightSection.description: Estimate guests or workers, factor in event length and location constraints, then choose between standard, ADA, or luxury trailers. Contact us for a free site assessment and recommendation.

allowedItems: Construction job sites and subcontractor use
Small weddings, backyard parties, and neighborhood events
prohibitedItems: No dumping of hazardous chemicals or oils
Do not use for waste disposal from heavy machinery
No open flame or smoking inside unit
Vandalism or intentional damage may incur fees
lists.idealHeading: Ideal Projects for a Standard Portable Toilet:
idealProjects: Residential or small commercial construction sites
Weekend community events and pop-up markets

lists.title: ADA-Compliant Portable Toilet
lists.shortDescription: Spacious, wheelchair-accessible unit with grab bars, low threshold, and larger interior for accessibility compliance.
lists.description:
• Designed For: Mobility-impaired users, ADA compliance at public events and job sites

  • Benefits:

    • Wider door and interior turning radius for wheelchair access

    • Sturdy grab bars and non-slip flooring

    • Clearly marked ADA signage and easier entry/exit
lists.h2: ADA-Compliant Portable Toilet Rentals for Construction Sites and Accessible Events in Los Angeles, CA
lists.p2: Ensure your site or event meets accessibility requirements with our ADA-compliant units. These portable restrooms provide a roomy interior, secure handrails, and a ramped entry when needed. They are commonly used on public works jobs, festivals, and any event that must comply with local accessibility codes. Call Us at [phone] to schedule ADA units and arrange compliance documentation.
lists.tyesHeading: Why Choose Our ADA-Compliant Portable Toilets in Los Angeles, CA?
lists.p3: Meets ADA clearance standards | Stable ramps and grab rails | Wider doorways for mobility devices | Regular cleaning and restocking available | Helpful staff for placement and setup
lists.seoContent:
Trusted ADA-Compliant Portable Toilet Rental in Los Angeles, CA

Need accessible portable toilets for your site or event? Our ADA units in Los Angeles provide compliant, dignified facilities for guests and workers. We offer on-time delivery, expert placement, and flexible service plans. Call Us at [phone] to reserve accessible units today!
lists.overViewContent:
• Not Accepted:

    • Hazardous waste or chemical disposal

    • Improper weight loads (avoid placing heavy equipment on ramps)

What's Included:

  • Delivery, setup, and pickup

  • ADA signage and optional ramp

  • Scheduled pump & clean and restocking

Unit Dimensions (approx):
6' L x 5' W x 8' H (clear interior space complies with accessibility guidelines)
Designed for safe, dignified use by mobility-impaired guests and crew members

leftSection.title: Event Accessibility Options
leftSection.description: Pair ADA units with nearby handwash stations and shaded placement to create accessible restroom clusters at events.

rightSection.title: How to Select the Right Accessible Unit
rightSection.description: Determine required number of ADA units based on expected attendance and local code. Our team provides guidance for permits and layout to ensure compliance.

allowedItems: Public festivals and fairs requiring accessible facilities
Long-term rentals where inclusive access is required
prohibitedItems: No disposal of industrial solvents or hazardous liquids
Avoid blocking the door or ramp with equipment
Do not alter grab bars or interior fixtures
lists.idealHeading: Ideal Projects for an ADA-Compliant Portable Toilet:
idealProjects: Construction projects that require ADA compliance
Large public events with accessibility requirements

lists.title: Luxury Restroom Trailer
lists.shortDescription: Multi-stall, climate-controlled restroom trailer with flushing toilets, running water, and sinks — ideal for weddings and VIP events.
lists.description:
• Capacity: Multi-stall configurations (2, 4, or 6 stalls typical)

  • Benefits:

    • Indoor-style amenities: running water, flushing toilets, and real sinks

    • Climate control, interior lighting, and upscale finishes

    • Perfect for weddings, film sets, corporate events, and VIP areas
lists.h2: Reliable Event Portable Toilet Rentals in Los Angeles, CA
lists.p2: For upscale events and VIP areas, our luxury restroom trailers bring the comfort of indoor restrooms to your outdoor venue. Choose trailers with multiple private stalls, attendants, and full plumbing when available. We handle delivery, setup, water and power hookups (if required), and on-site servicing to keep facilities pristine throughout your event. Call Us today to book a luxury trailer for your Los Angeles event!
lists.tyesHeading: Events That Benefit from Our Luxury Restroom Trailers in Los Angeles, CA
lists.p3: Weddings and receptions | Corporate brand activations | High-end film and production sets | Private parties and VIP hospitality | Festivals with premium areas
lists.seoContent:
Luxury Restroom Trailer Rentals in Los Angeles, CA

Elevate your event with a luxury restroom trailer from Haute Porta Potty Rental. Our trailers offer the highest level of comfort and style, including flushing toilets, hot running water, attractive interiors, and optional attendants. Call Us at [phone] to discuss trailer sizes and service packages!
lists.overViewContent:
• Not Accepted:

    • Use as storage for catering equipment or mains power beyond trailer specs

    • Disposal of hazardous or industrial waste

What's Included:

  • Delivery, setup, and leveling

  • Freshwater hookup, holding tanks (or direct plumbing where available)

  • Luxury toiletries, paper products, and optional attendant service

Typical Trailer Dimensions:
20' L x 8.5' W x 9' H (configurations vary by model)
Capacity: Multiple private stalls and sinks; exact stall count depends on trailer model

leftSection.title: Additional Event Services
leftSection.description: We can provide attendants, scheduled cleaning, on-site generators, and water delivery to support luxury trailers at any outdoor venue.

rightSection.title: How to Select the Right Trailer
rightSection.description: Estimate guest count, event duration, and whether water/power hookups are available. Our event specialists will recommend an appropriate trailer size and service cadence.

allowedItems: Interior lighting and climate control (where equipped)
Optional on-site attendant and restocking service
Paper products, soap, and hand towels provided
prohibitedItems: No use for hazardous chemical disposal
No unauthorized electrical modifications to trailer hookups
Do not overload holding tanks beyond recommended limits
Food preparation inside trailer is not permitted
lists.idealHeading: Ideal Projects for a Luxury Restroom Trailer:
